thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: June

author: June
title: June
text: I love these books. There is a lot of books to order from this company. They ship fast and they have new ones and older ones. So if there is a book you need in a series this company probably has it! Lots of their books are 3.59 plus I love the Rewards where you get 5.00 off once you order 50.00. I highly recommend this company! For someone who loves reading like I do this company is for you!
